# Nobility (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* | Abadar |
| | *Greyhawk:* | Altua, [[Heironeous]], [[Pelor]], Tem-Et-Nu |

| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers**: You are a great leader, an inspiration to all who follow the teachings of your faith.

- *Inspiring Word (Sp)*: As a standard action, you can speak an inspiring word to a creature within 30 feet. That creature receives a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Leadership (Ex)*: At 8th level, you receive [[Leadership (Feat)|Leadership]] as a bonus feat. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on your leadership score as long as you uphold the tenets of your deity (or divine concept if you do not venerate a deity).

**Nobility Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Divine Favor (Spell)|Divine Favor]]****:** You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

**2** **[[Enthrall (Spell)|Enthrall]]****:** Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

**3** **[[Magic Vestment (Spell)|Magic Vestment]]****:** Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.

**  ** **[[Unseen Entourage (Spell)|Unseen Entourage]]****:** As *[[Improved Unseen Servant (Spell)|improved unseen servant]]* but caster gets 1 servant/level.

**4** **[[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]****:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**5** **[[Command, Greater (Spell)|Command, Greater]]****:** As *[[Command (Spell)|command]]**,* but affects one subject/level.

**6** **[[Geas_Quest (Spell)|Geas/Quest]]****:** As *[[Geas, Lesser (Spell)|lesser geas]]**,* plus it affects any creature. 

**7** **[[Repulsion (Spell)|Repulsion]]****:** Creatures canâ€™t approach you.

**8** **[[Demand (Spell)|Demand]]****:** As *[[Sending (Spell)|sending]]**,* plus you can send *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]**.*

**9** **[[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|Storm of Vengeance]]****:** Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.
